title: Bloomberg Markets: Woodside Says Dropbox for `Teams in Sync'
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Woodside Says Dropbox for `Teams in Sync'
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Dennis Woodside Chief Operating Officer Dropbox Discussing the growth of the collaboration tool and the impact of the global ransomware attack.
